QuestData.Title: Sizing Up The Opposition
QuestData.Description:
No doubt your High Exarch will fret at the news that we lack the resources to assault Antorus. He is not used to believing his vaunted Army of the Light to be inadequate.
His pride is no concern of mine. While he plots a new strategy, I will bathe the ground in demon blood.
Go. There is much to be done before we can achieve our final victory.
